item.title: Japan!
item.description: Our Awesome 30th Anniversary Trip to Japan In late October of 2019, Sue & I traveled to Japan for our (delayed) 30th anniversary trip. We had an amazing time. This is a blog post about our adventures. First Stop – Tokyo We flew on Friday evening, 10/25/2019, to Haneda airport. The flight (which was on ANA) took off three hours late for no obvious reason, and landed two hours late.
